comment._content: This would be as contenders for the world lightweight boxing champion in 1914. He fought Freddie Welsh in 1914 and lost the title to him. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willie_Ritchie en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freddie_Welsh
